name: wino
text: i love the pochego

name: pie4me6
text:
I am the first person to chubby this three year old comment.

I feel accomplished.

name: catachresis
text:
A robot, who lies. He is called Lie Bot.
That's how you write a character to last.

name: ambala
text: His lies, they are so elaborate.

name: juancarlos
text: First four-beef rated strip for me. All in all Liebot and Phillipe are the only characters that've stayed the same throughout the years.

name: waldo913
text:
There are those who might argue that the phillippe of the first few strips is significantly different than the present-day phillippe...

While I am one of those, I do see your point, especially with regards to lie-bot.

(If you are speaking strictly about their appearance, however, you would be entirely correct.)

name: purplehaze
text: Personality wise, Teodor hasn't changed a great deal. Still good at cooking, still kind of an internet womanizer.

name: jonmw
text: By which you mean that he becomes a woman on the internet

name: billyamericana
text: A comment left by billyamericana was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by ShemmJacc, Ariamaki, equinn2006, fancypants, Rapid_Roy, toughasnails001)

name: gormster
text: That robot can lie like George Bush, period.

name: killerlimpet
text: As in, it lies like a rug and gets away with it?

name: shutup_shutup
text:
IF Lie Bot lies like George Bush
AND Lie Bot likes like a rug
THEN George Bush = A rug?

name: saint
text: What did a rug do to you to deserve that kind of slanderous slur?

name: fermatprime
text: It really tied that room together.

name: ganymedeio
text: That's not the issue at hand right now, dude.

name: fattypneumonia
text: Who's "George Bush?"

name: i_love_kate
text: Shut the fuck up, Donny.

name: mortshire
text: this strip made a 15-year-old me feel really smart for knowing what rubber soul was.

name: jokercross
text: His "proof" is what sells it for me.

name: alisonface
text:
Is anyone else dorky enough to pull out Rubber Soul and see if there's any truth at all in this lie?

Because I'm about to.

name: kardlonoc
text: Go for it.

name: gouldgonewild
text: I, once had some cheese, or should I say, it once had me...

name: scorpio_nadir
text:
wasn't it good
goudagonewood.

Now I'm up for some cheese & beatles.

name: farqussus
text: well? Well?

name: fuckyoufriday
text: Hey, my copy of Rubber Soul doesn't have liner notes! SHIT!

name: honesttom
text: The Man stopped producing them. He wanted that pochego all to himself, none for the honest working guy.

name: townsend
text: You can tell simply from the pictures of the Fab Four inside the album that they know about the pochego, and no, they aren't sharing the secret, those naughty boys.

name: max
text: The sideburns sold me on his mendacity from panel 1.

name: beefsmipeep
text: The sideburns and the aviators - he's a mechanical used-car salesman!

name: tetrisattack
text: A comment left by tetrisattack was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Dovey, MrMojoRisin, StagnantDisplay, cale, atticusonline, Townsend)

name: lokier
text: Achewood owns the word pochego in google

name: lereya
text: Yeah, nevermind.  Looks like I spoke too soon about the ears.

name: luckypyjamas
text: so i went all the way through the archives, rated my share of comics, and just now noticed the different expressions of roast beef in the ratings boxes

name: rowboat
text: See a physician.

name: helladepressed
text: How is what is the first Lie Bot appearance rated so low? Hell the joke is even pretty good!

name: aristagoras
text:
Exactly. It worries me that Achewood's active readership is all over the Great Outdoor Fight but finds a strip like this not even four out of five.

But I guess it's the same reason Amy Winehouse won a Grammy...

name: saturnbeads
text:
Personally, I think this strip is solid gold.

Lie Bot = best.

name: zapatos
text: Lie Bot makes me wish I was a better man.  A man, who was better at lieing.

name: sankster
text: Lie Bot himself is awesome, but he's seen better days, in my opinion, i.e. the retard and the egg.

name: rachel
text: the retard and the egg is probably my favorite one.  jeeeesus

name: weekendofsound
text: Lie Bot and little nephew are rarely seen these days.

name: i_love_kate
text: Pochego doesn't even sound remotely French. Which is probably why he had to sell it with the Rubber Soul proof.

name: tekende
text: Also, nachos aren't an even remotely French food, so why would the best nacho cheese be from France? It really is just not a very good lie, but that is part of why it is funny.

name: jjg
text: I don't recall Lie Bot ever having to elaborate on any lies this much. Liner notes, pschah

name: baryonyx
text: Enter Lie Bot.

name: idsyen
text: Wonderfully archetypal first lie for Lie Bot: Specific, easily disprovable, total nonsense, uttered with total conviction and a hint of condescension, hilarious

name: ldm
text: Rubber Soul is a pretty great album.

name: em2
text: Pochego: It's listed right after George Martin's credit for the harpsichord solo on "In My Life."

name: wonelove
text: " Hey man.. "

name: sparhawk
text: I just wanna push on his nose.

name: wonglers
text:
Lie Bot is not even funny.

Signed,
Lie Man

name: greenkoolayd
text: teodor doesnt know what cheese is good for nachos?  thats a load of bullshit!

name: harvestgold
text: And if you play "Maybe I'm Amazed" backwards you'll hear a really rippin recipe for lentil soup.
